languages.text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом, опуская топор.{/n} "Признаю, признаю, ксеносы не столь изощрены в искусстве нелепых заявлений Вольных Торговцев, чтобы прикинуться частью свиты. Но тогда что же это?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом, опуская топор.{/n} "Признаю, признаю, ксеносы не столь изощрены в искусстве нелепых заявлений Вольных Торговцев, чтобы прикинуться частью свиты. Но тогда что же это?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом, опуская топор.{/n} "Признаю, признаю, ксеносы не столь изощрены в искусстве нелепых заявлений Вольных Торговцев, чтобы прикинуться частью свиты. Но тогда что же это?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well-versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well-versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well-versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well-versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos parpadea sorprendido y de repente estalla en carcajadas, bajando el hacha.{/n} «Tengo que admitirlo, los xenos no están tan versados en la rimbombancia de los Comerciantes Independientes para hacerse pasar por miembros del séquito de {mf|uno|una}. ¿Pero entonces qué tenemos aquí?».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos parpadea sorprendido y de repente estalla en carcajadas, bajando el hacha.{/n} «Tengo que admitirlo, los xenos no están tan versados en la rimbombancia de los Comerciantes Independientes para hacerse pasar por miembros del séquito de {mf|uno|una}. ¿Pero entonces qué tenemos aquí?».

languages.text: {n}卡利戈斯惊讶地眨眨眼，随后突然大笑起来，放下了他的能量斧。{/n}“我得承认，我得承认，异形不可能这么精通行商浪人的艺术，也不可能说出这样的荒唐话，谎称自己是谁的随从什么的。不过，这到底是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡利戈斯惊讶地眨眨眼，随后突然大笑起来，放下了他的能量斧。{/n}“我得承认，我得承认，异形不可能这么精通行商浪人的艺术，也不可能说出这样的荒唐话，谎称自己是谁的随从什么的。不过，这到底是怎么回事？”

languages.text: {n}Calligos cligne des yeux de surprise, puis éclate de rire et abaisse sa hache.{/n} « Il est vrai que les xénos ne sont pas assez versés dans de l'art de faire des déclarations ridicules pour se faire passer pour des membres de l'entourage d'un libre-marchand. Mais alors, qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos cligne des yeux de surprise, puis éclate de rire et abaisse sa hache.{/n} « Il est vrai que les xénos ne sont pas assez versés dans de l'art de faire des déclarations ridicules pour se faire passer pour des membres de l'entourage d'un libre-marchand. Mais alors, qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは驚いて目を瞬かせると、突然笑い出し、斧を下ろした。{/n}「認めるよ、わかった、異種族は自由開拓者の従者となれるほどの戯言を言えるほどの技術は持っていない。しかし、ではこれは何だというのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは驚いて目を瞬かせると、突然笑い出し、斧を下ろした。{/n}「認めるよ、わかった、異種族は自由開拓者の従者となれるほどの戯言を言えるほどの技術は持っていない。しかし、ではこれは何だというのだ？」

languages.text: {n}Calligos blinzelt überrascht, bricht dann plötzlich in Gelächter aus und lässt seine Axt sinken.{/n} "Ich muss zugeben, Xenos verstehen sich nicht gut genug auf die große Freihändlerkunst, hanebüchene Aussagen zu tätigen, um als Mitglied eines Gefolges durchzugehen. Aber was ist dann das?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos blinzelt überrascht, bricht dann plötzlich in Gelächter aus und lässt seine Axt sinken.{/n} "Ich muss zugeben, Xenos verstehen sich nicht gut genug auf die große Freihändlerkunst, hanebüchene Aussagen zu tätigen, um als Mitglied eines Gefolges durchzugehen. Aber was ist dann das?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos, şaşkınlıkla gözünü kırparak aniden kahkaha patlatıyor ve baltasını indiriyor.{/n} "Tamam, zenoların maiyete ait gibi görünmek için saçma sapan iddialarda bulunma sanatına Hür Tacirler kadar hâkim olmadıklarını kabul ediyorum. Peki bu ne şimdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter, lowering his axe.{/n} "I admit, I admit, xenos are not quite well versed enough in the Rogue Trader art of making ridiculous statements to pass as a member of one's retinue. But then what's this?"
